paper_abstract: The error detecting problem for limited magnitude errors over high radix channels is studied. In this error model, the error magnitude does not exceed a certain limited value and it is known beforehand. For asymmetric, unidirectional, and symmetric channels, both all and t error detecting codes are studied. In all these cases, close-to-optimal codes are proposed.
paper_title: Limited Magnitude Error Detecting Codes over Z(q)
